---
layout: post
title: When I don't know where to hang my umbrella...
tags: homedecor home
categories: personal
date:   2017-01-06 17:05:14 -0500
---
I rarely go out when it rains, so I hardly get my umbrella wet.

And I bought this lovely *[gunmetal photo clip](http://www.cb2.com/gunmetal-photo-clip/s140897)* for hanging photos or art pieces, but it somehow 
turned into my umbrella hanger - works like a charm.

<blockquote class="instagram-media" data-instgrm-version="7" style=" background:#FFF; border:0; border-radius:3px; box-shadow:0 0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.15); margin: 1px; max-width:658px; padding:0; width:99.375%; width:-webkit-calc(100% - 2px); width:calc(100% - 2px);"><div style="padding:8px;"> <div style=" background:#F8F8F8; line-height:0; margin-top:40px; padding:50.0% 0; text-align:center; width:100%;"> <div style=" background:url(data:image/png;base64,); display:block; height:44px; margin:0 auto -44px; position:relative; top:-22px; width:44px;"></div></div><p style=" color:#c9c8cd; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px; margin-bottom:0; margin-top:8px; overflow:hidden; padding:8px 0 7px; text-align:center; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap;"><a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BO7uU_hD0Y2/" style=" color:#c9c8cd; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; font-style:normal; font-weight:normal; line-height:17px; text-decoration:none;" target="_blank">Max（@easyandme）发的照片</a> · <time style=" font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px;" datetime="2017-01-06T18:35:46+00:00">2017-01-6，10:35 PST</time></p></div></blockquote>
<script async defer src="//platform.instagram.com/en_US/embeds.js"></script>

<br />
It's all about <b>balance</b>. A tiny little hardly-worth-mentioning trick meight be applied here. The photo itself also conveys a bizzare sense of 
balance - I did it deliberately, of course.

I also like the combination of all these stuff I bought from _ikea_, _amazon_, _muji_ or _cb2_. That little grey boombox amplifier, which cost only _$.99_ but sadly is 
no longer available on cb2, works (and looks) great with my retired iPhone 5s. 

<blockquote class="instagram-media" data-instgrm-version="7" style=" background:#FFF; border:0; border-radius:3px; box-shadow:0 0 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.5),0 1px 10px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.15); margin: 1px; max-width:658px; padding:0; width:99.375%; width:-webkit-calc(100% - 2px); width:calc(100% - 2px);"><div style="padding:8px;"> <div style=" background:#F8F8F8; line-height:0; margin-top:40px; padding:33.24074074074074% 0; text-align:center; width:100%;"> <div style=" background:url(data:image/png;base64,); display:block; height:44px; margin:0 auto -44px; position:relative; top:-22px; width:44px;"></div></div><p style=" color:#c9c8cd; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px; margin-bottom:0; margin-top:8px; overflow:hidden; padding:8px 0 7px; text-align:center; text-overflow:ellipsis; white-space:nowrap;"><a href="https://www.instagram.com/p/BJwVxISAPKL/" style=" color:#c9c8cd; font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; font-style:normal; font-weight:normal; line-height:17px; text-decoration:none;" target="_blank">Max（@easyandme）发的照片</a> · <time style=" font-family:Arial,sans-serif; font-size:14px; line-height:17px;" datetime="2016-08-31T01:52:33+00:00">2016-08-30，18:52 PDT</time></p></div></blockquote>
<br />
If you want to see a bigger picture, here it is.

<br />
Looks cozy, doesn't it? I love the _The Great Wave off Kanagawa_ frame particularly. It's the middle panel of
[the three](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00Y8DRWD8/) I bought on Amazon for around 30 bucks.

But I rarely go out when it rains, so I hardly get my umbrella wet.
